alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hall; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Buffalo and west central Hall Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poole, or 21 miles north of Kearney, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gibbon. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 275 and 276. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
